tossup_question: 31) BIOLOGY  If for two clades A and B, B is a subset of the sister group of A, what is the relation of clade A to clade B
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Basal
X) Derived
Y) Root
Z)Crown
bonus_question: 31) BIOLOGY  The env gene in HIV codes for a precursor polypeptide called gp160 which is cleaved by Furin to gp120 and gp41. To what cell receptor does gp120 subsequently bind?
